resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/107221</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>107221</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205456</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Steppin Out: Crooked Jades</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Steppin Heraus: Gekrümmte Jaden</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Steppin Dehors : Jades Tordus</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Steppin Para fora: Jades Curvados</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Steppin Fuori: Jades Curvati</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Steppin έξω: Στριμμένο Jades</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Steppin Hacia fuera: Jades Torcidos</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">SPARK visits with Crooked Jades as they rehearse, perform, and prepare for their tour. This Educator Guide is about old-time music and its roots.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <coverage>
            <string language="en">North America</string>
          </coverage>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">FUNKEN-Besuche mit gekrümmten Jaden, während sie
proben, führen durch und bereiten sich für ihre Tour vor. 
Diese Erzieher-Anleitung ist über Altzeit Musik und seine 
Wurzeln.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les visites d'ÉTINCELLE avec les jades tordus 
pendant qu'elles préparent, exécutent, et se préparent à leur 
excursion. Ce guide d'éducateur est au sujet de la musique 
d'autrefois et de ses racines.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As visitas da FAÍSCA com jades curvados enquanto 
rehearse, executam, e preparam-se para sua excursão. Esta guia 
do educador é sobre a música do velho-tempo e as suas raizes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le chiamate della SCINTILLA con i jades curvati 
mentre preparano, effettuano e si preparano per il loro giro. 
Questa guida dell'educatore è circa musica di vecchio-tempo e 
le relative radici.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι επισκέψεις ΣΠΙΝΘΗΡΩΝ με στριμμένο Jades καθώς 
προετοιμάζουν, εκτελούν, και προετοιμάζονται για το γύρο τους. 
Αυτός ο οδηγός εκπαιδευτικών είναι για την αλλοτινή 
μουσική και τις ρίζες του.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Las visitas de la CHISPA con jades torcidos como 
ensayan, se realizan, y se preparan para su viaje. Esta guía 
del educador está sobre música del viejo-tiempo y sus raíces.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέχνες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205456</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>107221</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/steppin-out-crooked-jades</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
